author: Stan Schroeder
title: Amazon workers in U.S. test positive for coronavirus in 8 warehouses
description: Amazon workers in eight warehouses across the U.S. have tested positive for COVID-19, the Washington Post and NPR reported Wednesday. Citing local media reports and Amazon, the Washington Post says Amazon workers have tested positive with the disease in New Y…
